title: the error of using placeholder in summary.scalar
body_html:
class Model(object):

def init(self,
images=None,
actions=None,
states=None,
sequence_length=None,
reuse_scope=None):
self.prefix = prefix = tf.placeholder(tf.string, [])
summaries.append(
tf.summary.scalar(prefix + '_recon_cost' + str(i), recon_cost))

get the error of *** TypeError: expected string or bytes-like object, use the old summary_scalar is ok

body:
class Model(object):

  def __init__(self,
               images=None,
               actions=None,
               states=None,
               sequence_length=None,
               reuse_scope=None):
    self.prefix = prefix = tf.placeholder(tf.string, [])
    summaries.append(
          tf.summary.scalar(prefix + '_recon_cost' + str(i), recon_cost))



get the error of *** TypeError: expected string or bytes-like object, use the old summary_scalar is ok
